6d18bfff-0f53-469b-934e-9806dda9d4fb.advice:
There are many kinds of metadata, each serving their own purpose.  Some key metadata that you should consider:
* There is metadata that helps identify where the data is coming from (e.g. who created it, title). For this the [Dublin Core](https://www.dublincore.org) is often used.
* There are different ways of adding metadata to make the data "discoverable" for other researchers. This requires either keywords or ontology terms describing what is in the data.
* There is metadata describing how the data can be re-used, such as license information and, for data about people, the extent of their consent for data reuse.
* There is metadata that makes the data understandable, e.g. linking to the exact processes used to collect them (is a *body temperature* measured under the tongue or in the rectum?) and units (is a temperature given in Celsius or Fahrenheit?). 
* There is metadata describing where the data comes from and what it is useful for. For frequently used data types, there are often very well defined metadata standards, in other cases you may need to think about this yourself.
For each of these kinds of metadata there are specific standards. There is no single standard that will get you all the metadata needed to make the data as FAIR as possible.
6d18bfff-0f53-469b-934e-9806dda9d4fb.label: Explore

70442fd3-bea2-4e97-81f5-e9b33eec6cac.advice:
If the intermediate data is larger than either input or output data, you may consider minimizing the time it is stored. Make the balance between the CPU time needed if you need to re-calculate it versus the storage requirements. Sometimes it is possible to avoid storage at all by immediately running the whole analysis work flow.

It may also be useful to consider storing the intermediate data on a separate data volume from the rest of the project storage, which may not be backed up. This can not only reduce the storage costs, but also if the backup needs to be used it is better if it strictly contains the data that is needed for a restore, otherwise a restore i case of a problem may take much longer than strictly necessary.
70442fd3-bea2-4e97-81f5-e9b33eec6cac.label: Intermediate data

10a10ffd-bfe1-4c6b-bbb6-3dfb1e63a5d5.text:
In the processing phase, the data will be undergoing the mostly automated steps for processing, before the analysis and interpretation.

In this chapter, many questions are focusing on the compute environment that is used to process the data and make it available for interpretation by project partners. Some of those questions (e.g. on workflow systems and data provenance) are also relevant for the work in the interpretation phase.
10a10ffd-bfe1-4c6b-bbb6-3dfb1e63a5d5.title: Processing data

6be88f7c-f868-460f-bba7-91e1c659adfd.text: This chapter deals with the information needed by people who will re-use your data, and with the access conditions they will need to follow.
6be88f7c-f868-460f-bba7-91e1c659adfd.title: Giving access to data

82fd0cce-2b41-423f-92ad-636d0872045c.text:
Before you decide to embark on any new study, it is good practice to check all options to re-use existing available data, either collected or generated by yourself in an earlier project, or data from others (Barend Mons calls this "Other PEople's Data And Services" or OPEDAS). This can include reusable data that have been created for an earlier study, and also so-called "reference data" which is used by many projects.

It is not because we can generate massive amounts of data that we always need to do so. Creating data with public money is bringing with it the responsibility to treat those data well and (if potentially useful) make them available for re-use by others. And the circle is only complete if such data is actually re-used.
82fd0cce-2b41-423f-92ad-636d0872045c.title: Re-using data

83438863-0aa0-4458-b14b-2b2c0d4f811d.text: The interpretation of the data consists of the last steps of processing (often with manual interventions), visualisation, and data integration. In this chapter many questions about data interoperability will come up.
83438863-0aa0-4458-b14b-2b2c0d4f811d.title: Interpreting data

b1df3c74-0b1f-4574-81c4-4cc2d780c1af.text:
In this chapter we describe all the sources of data: they can e.g. come from instruments or from questionnaires; data can be newly collected as part of the current project, but it can also be pre-existing data that may need proper contracts with the maintainer, some pre-processing, and quality checks. It can also be reference data that is part of curated resources and (public) databases. 

For more information see [Collecting in RDMKit](https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/collecting)
b1df3c74-0b1f-4574-81c4-4cc2d780c1af.title: Creating and collecting data

d5b27482-b598-4b8c-b534-417d4ad27394.text: In this chapter, issues regarding data publication and long term archiving are addressed.
d5b27482-b598-4b8c-b534-417d4ad27394.title: Preserving data

0bafe0c2-a8f2-4c74-80c8-dbf3a5b8e9b7.description: The Reusability metric describes how well the data is suitable for reuse in other context. The score associated with an answer will be higher if it makes it easier for humans and computers to reuse the data. This is influenced largely by proper description of how the data was obtained, and also by the conditions that are put on the reuse (license and, for personally identifying information, consent).
0bafe0c2-a8f2-4c74-80c8-dbf3a5b8e9b7.title: Reusability

0feac7e6-add4-4723-abae-be5ce7864c63.description: The Accessibility metric describes how well the access to the database is described and how easy it is to implement. The score associated with an answer will be higher if it makes it easier for humans and computers to get to the data. This is determined by e.g. the protocol for accessing the data or for authenticating users, and also by the guaranteed longevity of the repository. Note that this is different from the Openness metric!
0feac7e6-add4-4723-abae-be5ce7864c63.title: Accessibility

8845fe2b-79df-4138-baea-3a035bf5e249.description: The Good DMP Practice metric describes how appreciated a process is among Data Stewards. A score associated with an answer will be high if a practice would be considered preferable over alternatives, generally a good idea.
8845fe2b-79df-4138-baea-3a035bf5e249.title: Good DMP Practice

8db30660-d4e5-4c0a-bf3e-553f3f0f997a.description: The Findability metric describes how easily data can be located. The score associated with an answer will be higher if it makes it easier for humans or for computers to locate your data set, e.g. if it ends up in an index or has a unique resolvable identifier.
8db30660-d4e5-4c0a-bf3e-553f3f0f997a.title: Findability

a42bded3-a085-45f8-b384-32b4a77c8385.description: The Interoperability metric describes how well the data interoperates with other data. The score associated with an answer will be higher if it makes it easier for humans and computers to couple the data with other data and 'understand' relationships. This is influenced by the use of standard ontologies for different fields and proper descriptions of the relations. It is also influenced by proper standard metadata that is agreed by the community.
a42bded3-a085-45f8-b384-32b4a77c8385.title: Interoperability

cc02c5a0-9754-4432-a7e0-ce0f3cf7a0a0.description: The Openness metric describes how Open the data are available. Note that this is different from the Accessibility metric. A score associated with an answer will be high if the data will be as open as possible, and low if voluntary restrictions apply to access and re-use.
cc02c5a0-9754-4432-a7e0-ce0f3cf7a0a0.title: Openness

A 'disease' could e.g. be the disease that the patient is suffering from, but it could also be an earlier diagnose, a suspected diagnose, or the disease a family member recently died of.

This can be done with traditional table database technology, but it is also possible to use Linked Data and RDF.

10b6548c-21cd-44c8-a8de-47415e7b012e.text: Many reference datasets and databases evolve over time. If the reference data changes, this may affect your results. If different versions of a reference data exist, you need to establish your "version policy".
10b6548c-21cd-44c8-a8de-47415e7b012e.title: Is the reference database or dataset versioned?

1147485f-b9a9-486c-8341-27e05718c508.text: The general term 'backup' is used for protection against two different kinds of problems: equipment failure and human error. Protections against these two may need different solutions. Both are considered backup for this and subsequent questions.
1147485f-b9a9-486c-8341-27e05718c508.title: Do you need frequent backups?

1270ea5a-92a2-46ce-b658-9bf2862b9b57.text: Repositories often allow search engines and catalogues to index the metadata in an automated way. Will this be the case for your data?

12762d00-f02a-40f7-b175-c7e4c92f5f54.title: How will you make sure the same reference data will be available to reproduce your results?

12baa8af-db59-43a5-8ec7-0941c58ff89a.text: Horizon Europe demands that metadata is completely open, e.g. provided under a CC0 license, and that any deviation from this is clarified.

1302cb21-6a98-490e-b64d-acf4744a8b1a.text: Some data types may be closely coupled to specific software packages. If that is the case for this data set, please name and point out the required software.

Please note that it is not easy for yourself to see all other ways in which others could be reusing your data.
15573266-7ddf-4c6b-962e-45691d34cf61.title: Will you consider re-usability of your data beyond your original purpose?

15eb6fe6-7b21-493b-a5a0-09ac63212ab6.text: If the coupling parameters are lenient, you will find more connections than when they are strict. But you may find that they are less accurate. This is a balance.
15eb6fe6-7b21-493b-a5a0-09ac63212ab6.title: Did you make a conscious decision to be either accurate or complete?

15ee1921-1fea-4f22-b462-b3cf7cdd4646.text: Different anonymization techniques exist. Disadvantage of anonymization is that data integration becomes virtually impossible, but it may be the only way to open up your data for other research.

192fc5d3-dc2a-495c-8f24-f59a4c5d95c9.text: Formats like XLS or SQL are very flexible; they can be adapted to many different uses, and this makes them good for interoperability. However, their flexibility also makes that it is not immediately obvious from the file structure how it can be used. The data needs a proper *description* in order for others (or yourself at a later time) to be able to unambiguously understand what it contains.
192fc5d3-dc2a-495c-8f24-f59a4c5d95c9.title: Is this data format completely described?

46039bea-87e6-4c61-8567-4e819404b4d0.text:
Data is sometimes difficult to locate, especially if it is not in a domain-specific repository. Data catalogues may increase findability: they put the metadata for data sets that are located in different places together in one location that is well known to researchers in a particular field. 

Data sets can be mentioned in multiple data catalogues without the need for duplicating the data: the data catalogues point to where the actual data can be found.

An example is [Narcis](https://dans.knaw.nl/nl/over/diensten/narcis) (for research data in the Netherlands).
46039bea-87e6-4c61-8567-4e819404b4d0.title: Will you be adding a reference to the published data to at least one data catalogue?

You can decide to stay with the version that you started with; this can have the disadvantage that you will not benefit from added information or added consistency.

49c009cb-a38c-4836-9780-8a8b3dd1cbac.text:
Very many kinds of data are connected to people. If there could be a way for someone, including yourself, to find out who that person is, that is considered personal data.

Simple examples are name, birth day or address; but there are many other data that can be personal: for example a voice recording, a combination of a location and a time (traffic flow), genetic information, or an X-ray of the skull.
49c009cb-a38c-4836-9780-8a8b3dd1cbac.title: Will you collect any data connected to a person, "personal data"?

588ad032-56ba-4d52-b29c-6a5b56aa6569.text:
Will any of the data that you will be creating form a reference data set for future research (by others)?

Much of todays data is used in comparison with reference data. You may be comparing your own data with a "standard set" which is maintained as a collection by someone else. Or you could be determining differences to a standard (for example in bioinformatics, a genome is often compared with a reference genome to identify genomic variants). Will you be creating any data that will be reference data for other researchers?

6516eae1-98b2-48f2-9862-b5fb140cfad7.text:
The FAIR principles do not contain any direction towards "Openness". This is done on purpose, because there can be compelling reasons not to make data "Open", such as privacy, other sensitive data, or intellectual property protection.

The true goal of funding agencies is to create the maximum value for society from their investments. They therefore often add "As open as possible, as closed as necessary" to the requirements for funding.

69999c2c-2710-480e-b8ac-8a8fc6f582e5.text:
Although there is no world-wide rule for the application of copyright on data sets (copyright only applies to things that require a so-called "creative step"), it is wise to check for an explicit permission to use a data set and not to assume that data can be used freely just because you can access it. 
Note that copyright laws explicitly *forbid* the use of a copyrighted work, *except* if you get permission. Such a permission is called a "licence". So: if you can not find a licence, you have to assume you can not use the data.
69999c2c-2710-480e-b8ac-8a8fc6f582e5.title: What are the conditions of use for this data set?

69be6695-152b-48ba-a1fd-6662476e39b7.text: Aggregated data, where typically at least 15 individuals are in any data point, are considered sufficiently anonymous. This is an alternative way of making data openly available for future research.

Please list any references to other data sets, e.g. from your project or from earlier research. 

Note: A qualified reference is a cross-reference that explains its intent. For example, X is regulator of Y is a much more qualified reference than X is associated with Y, or X see also Y. The goal therefore is to create as many meaningful links as possible between (meta)data resources to enrich the contextual knowledge about the data.

7dfd022e-6d6e-4923-a81a-ca1f11024b57.text:
The file names are very useful as metadata for people involved in the project, but to computers they are just identifiers. To prevent accidents with e.g. renamed files metadata information should always also be available elsewhere and not only through the file name.

Also note that if metadata could need to change, embedding it in the file names may require renaming files during the project; and this may have implications for references to those files.
7dfd022e-6d6e-4923-a81a-ca1f11024b57.title: Will all the metadata that is embedded in the file names also be available in the proper metadata?

80a682bd-8a5c-4a52-935d-680509838a4e.text:
Domain repositories often have the best functionality to make the data findable and reusable: even though it may look like a database that could be reused in a completely different field would be better findable in a generic repository, the limited availability of domain-specific metadata make that less valuable.

Many repositories are listed in https://fairsharing.org/

If a repository offers to give your data set a DOI or alternative persistent identifier it is a good idea to use that option.

948b5fd8-c1bd-457d-8f81-ea2fd093f541.text:
Data analysis is normally done step-by-step.  It is important that for all data the origin and all processing and filtering steps are documented, otherwise results will not be reproducible. 

Re-users of the data also need this information to decide whether the data can be used for their purpose.

In computing, systems like Galaxy and (Jupyter) notebooks often automatically keep provenance information.
948b5fd8-c1bd-457d-8f81-ea2fd093f541.title: How will you be keeping track of the "provenance" of the data?

98d9789b-32fc-4e2f-876a-47760ad7c7ec.text: Are there any data files e.g. on laptops of project members? Also: supercomputing centers and other high performance computer centers often write in their terms of use that you need to take care of your own backups.
98d9789b-32fc-4e2f-876a-47760ad7c7ec.title: Will you make backup copies of project data that is not in the work space?

a0d52f2d-6828-42b0-a1f1-cda4ed7dad3b.text: If you need to perform many similar calculations of different input data (e.g. samples or simulations), these can often be executed at the same time on different nodes in a compute system. This is sometimes called "trivial parallelism". Even though it is named "trivial", this still requires that the work flow and workflow system support this (e.g. by making sure all file names are unique, and that not many threads are trying to read or write the same file at the same time).
a0d52f2d-6828-42b0-a1f1-cda4ed7dad3b.title: Can your work flow and work flow system make use of "trivial" parallelism in the computations?

ae28a862-5020-44c2-8c78-3abc185b190f.text: It is not always clear to everyone in the project (and outside) what can and can not be done with a data set. It is helpful to associate each data set with a license as early as possible in the project. A data license should ideally be as free as possible: any restriction like 'only for non-commercial use' or 'attribution required' may reduce the reusability and thereby the number of citations. If possible, use a computer-readable and computer actionable license.
ae28a862-5020-44c2-8c78-3abc185b190f.title: Will a license be assigned to your datasets?

aee03da5-b399-4274-8db4-fac82c6210d3.text:
Although there is no world-wide rule for the application of copyright on data sets (copyright only applies to things that require a so-called "creative step"), it is wise to check for an explicit permission to use a data set and not to assume that data can be used freely just because you can access it. 
Note that copyright laws explicitly *forbid* the use of a copyrighted work, *except* if you get permission. Such a permission is called a "licence". So: if you can not find a licence, you have to assume you can not use the data.
aee03da5-b399-4274-8db4-fac82c6210d3.title: What are the conditions of use for this database or dataset?

Have you identified types of data that you will use that are used by others too? Some types of data (for example "images" or "tables") are used by many different projects. For such data, often common standards exist (in our example "JPG" and "CSV" [comma separated values]) that help to make these data reusable. Are you using such common data formats?

Please make sure you list all the data types that are important for your project. You should make sure also to list the formats used in any data sets that you are re-using.

ced5a7c2-4034-4763-a1d5-3cb815cdfddb.text:
Complicated (binary) file formats tend to change over time, and software may not stay compatible with older versions. Also, some formats (e.g. DOC, XLS) hamper long term usability by making use of patents or being hampered by restrictive licensing. 

Ideally a format should be simple, text only, completely described, not restricted by copyrights, and implemented in different software packages.
ced5a7c2-4034-4763-a1d5-3cb815cdfddb.title: Does this data format enable sharing and long term archiving?

cf727a0a-78c4-45a7-aa9b-cf7650ae873a.text:
Please add all "formal" identifiers you have for this data set: these can be handles or DOIs or any other type. One important purpose of these identifiers is to be able to find the dataset back.

A good identifier is _persistent_ (i.e. it does not change, and also the same identifier will never be used for another data set), _globally unique_ (nobody else uses the same identifier for a different data set) and _resolvable_ (you can actually locate the data set if you only know the identifier).

Note that if you will be publishing the dataset in a repository, the repository may also assign a persistent identifier. You will be able to specify such additional identifiers under the "publication"-questions. Specify one main identifier here.
cf727a0a-78c4-45a7-aa9b-cf7650ae873a.title: Identifier of the data set

cfb67fc9-4a65-4221-87ca-7ca7c99f13a4.title: What version of this software will you use?

d0306914-c253-472c-869f-19a60578c087.title: Will there be potential issues with statistical normalization?

d0e029ee-aee0-420f-bc6f-ad471410ad42.text:
It is important for re-users to know what consent items you asked exactly from participants.

Note that the answers from participants is personal data that requires protection!
d0e029ee-aee0-420f-bc6f-ad471410ad42.title: Will the consent form be available for re-users?

d206fcaf-a238-48ef-925e-6f006d39f2af.title: How will data security be dealt with?

d21fdb06-22bf-418e-aa40-dc5ef1485f56.text: Datasets can be assigned persistent identifiers. Just like journal articles get assigned DOIs, these are often also used for data sets. Note that the DOI of a paper is not a persistent identifier for its supplementary information.
d21fdb06-22bf-418e-aa40-dc5ef1485f56.title: Will this data be assigned a persistent identifier?

d34f2b16-77f0-425a-9e83-7b28095a58ca.title: Will you need data formats for Social Sciences?

d4191666-21f3-4875-8426-d12a3aa1ffce.title: Will you need existing data from Natural Sciences?

d45ad247-19d4-4919-9a6c-094f696168b6.title: Why did you decide not to use this reference data set?

d488b314-2b5c-4e79-be1e-c5742205d2a5.title: Where will the physical samples be stored

d4a879f1-0bad-4d6e-8ecc-07ae28e0848b.text: In many research fields there are standard file formats and types that have been established by disciplinary standards organisations. Using such standards can help increase the interoperability of your data with other data and tools. Do you need help finding the right standards to use in your research?
d4a879f1-0bad-4d6e-8ecc-07ae28e0848b.title: Do you need guidance on what data formats/types to use?

d4e6a244-07fb-4573-b93f-c20a9409ac7c.text: For optimum reusability data needs to be available for as long as possible. There may be financial reasons why you can't keep the data any longer; there may be legal reasons requiring you to delete the data.
d4e6a244-07fb-4573-b93f-c20a9409ac7c.title: How long will this data set be kept?

d4fe0b55-4aee-4d05-88d4-a3f4cad2cfa9.text: It can help if everyone in the project uses the same naming scheme.
d4fe0b55-4aee-4d05-88d4-a3f4cad2cfa9.title: Did you make appointments in the project on how to name files and folders?

d5784d24-0e66-4821-bd62-a711fb6d7a40.text: Much of the raw data you have will need to be archived for your own later use somewhere. This is often done off-line on tape, not on the disks of the compute facility. Please note that this does not refer to the data publication.
d5784d24-0e66-4821-bd62-a711fb6d7a40.title: Will you be archiving data (using so-called 'cold storage') for long term preservation already during your project?

d5ab8298-9382-455c-8241-f64d3cc54ffe.title: Are you running repeat samples or are you repeating measurements in order to monitor consistency of the results?

d5d21ad3-720c-4a6a-bd5a-09f14b15666f.title: Will you be integrating different data sources in order to get more information for each sample or data point?

d8150021-19d7-4e92-90c3-d9c3d62d188e.text: Do you need the compute capacity also for development? Can you start developing locally and start with a deployment test later?
d8150021-19d7-4e92-90c3-d9c3d62d188e.title: Have you established with the provider when will you need the compute capacity?

d8833614-8fb5-4535-b448-8e657d17ad44.text: There is no concrete map of these features to suitable workflow engines at this moment, but filling in these questions can lead you to think about the most important features for the project
d8833614-8fb5-4535-b448-8e657d17ad44.title: Does it need native support for specific data types?

da0d28e6-1c6e-44d8-ba47-d834aeca847b.title: How will the samples be identified?

dad8247a-3553-48dc-8518-d64057cded1e.text: What appointment have you made for the naming of the folders? Make sure names are relatively short, and avoid spaces and special characters.
dad8247a-3553-48dc-8518-d64057cded1e.title: What are the naming conventions for these folders?

db636108-c99c-41a7-89b5-70e0021384a1.title: What will you need to do in order to be able to re-use this data?

dbb6dcdf-dd2e-4829-8c03-16b2339ebd5a.title: Will you be integrating different data sources to get more samples or more data points?

dbf05c2a-0108-4cae-947d-c0383140f006.text: Preferably use a direct URL other users could use
dbf05c2a-0108-4cae-947d-c0383140f006.title: Please specify the software repository you use for development

dc327e53-cf4f-44e7-8e66-40ddf1b4ae0a.text: Project members may need to know about passwords (not sharing accounts, using different passwords for each service, and two factor authentication), about security for data they carry (encryption, backups), data stored in their own labs and in personal cloud accounts, and about the use of open WiFi and HTTPS.
dc327e53-cf4f-44e7-8e66-40ddf1b4ae0a.title: Have project members been instructed about the risks (generic and specific to the project)?

dc39957e-688a-4f71-a6a8-57f52509e7cf.text: Some "file" storage systems do not have a tree structure like we know in a file system, but rather have direct pointers to any file in the system. Such systems are called "object stores" or "document stores". Examples are Amazon S3 and CEPH, or MongoDB.
dc39957e-688a-4f71-a6a8-57f52509e7cf.title: Will you be storing data in an "object store" or a "document store" system?

dc4f1dc7-4608-45f9-8503-aa05536f4d97.title: Do you have all tools to couple the necessary data types?

dd918787-ffb1-499e-98f8-42050758c7ce.title: What type of compute architecture is most suitable for your work? Will you have that available?

de1b1a0f-58ea-4859-91b0-aa2b52090395.title: Where do you keep any applicable restrictions on the usage of the data?

de23bb94-b727-4907-9a5d-6f8c78c3e432.title: Will any of the repositories you use charge you for their services?

deb647ec-a001-4370-87b8-a5b1e2479f87.text: If the intermediate results are in your main work space, a restore in case of a problem could take much more time. It may be faster to recover it by re-running computations.
deb647ec-a001-4370-87b8-a5b1e2479f87.title: Is it possible to store intermediate temporary data on a separate (scratch) area that is not backed up?

deb9d6b3-4f11-4aa8-b016-52d1612c002a.text: Since you want to keep using the old version of the reference data, how will it be available to you?
deb9d6b3-4f11-4aa8-b016-52d1612c002a.title: How will the old version be available?

decb7c9c-c6dc-4027-8c0e-18934c852ca6.text: Especially if analysis and processing of data in the project is done on multiple different computers by different people, it is a good idea to have your own repository of tools and their blessed versions.
decb7c9c-c6dc-4027-8c0e-18934c852ca6.title: Will you use a central repository for all tools and their versions as used in your project?

df36fb68-131c-4f31-a42b-684abf523bbc.text: There are several questions regarding the dynamics of the data in the working area, who works with it, the software that is run on it, etc.
df36fb68-131c-4f31-a42b-684abf523bbc.title: How will you work with your data?

df3aff84-acf9-4614-996b-e69f7ddb96de.title: Are all tools you use under your complete control?

e0759fdc-7ce9-4020-816d-73119f634c7e.text: Data corruption or mistakes can happen with large amounts of files or large files. Keeping a *master list* with data checksums can be helpful to prevent expensive mistakes, because it will help detect early when data files are damaged or mixed up. It can also be helpful to keep the list under version control so that all changes are well documented.
e0759fdc-7ce9-4020-816d-73119f634c7e.title: Will you be keeping a master list with checksums of certified/correct/canonical/verified data?

e13bf3cb-cf78-486e-b844-2c12320919c4.title: Give a link/reference to the policy or process

e1dba221-ad5a-474e-a2e3-9b4e472959fa.text:
In some cases it is not practical to bring all data together:
* It may be legally hard to collect the data in one place for analysis
* It may be technically hard to transport data to a single place for analysis

In such cases, a Federated analysis approach may be applicable. Examples of such techniques are DataShield and the Personal Health Train. Secure multi-party computation may be useful too to prevent information leaking between parties.
e1dba221-ad5a-474e-a2e3-9b4e472959fa.title: Will you be using a federated analysis approach?

e23201aa-df56-4ade-9406-baa1fb6b1c0c.text: See also all questions about keeping metadata and data formats. Make sure the metadata is kept close to the data in the archive, and that community supported data formats are used for all long term archiving.
e23201aa-df56-4ade-9406-baa1fb6b1c0c.title: Will the data still be understandable and reusable after a long time?

e2401b56-5d7e-42c6-bb97-c8bede39b4b0.text: Controlled vocabularies should be used to limit what can be entered in most text fields.
e2401b56-5d7e-42c6-bb97-c8bede39b4b0.title: Are you using controlled vocabularies where possible?

e24167a2-14ec-445d-b205-fb6c7e24a7d1.title: What other quality processes do you use?

e33ae210-62fe-4665-b836-e71660325a06.text: Specify what technical instruments you are using to collect the data.
e33ae210-62fe-4665-b836-e71660325a06.title: Instruments used for data collection

e5f3081b-df3a-4059-83e2-5c69baa83c49.title: Why will the archival period not be extended?

e7b6cd51-22a6-4f7a-9ad5-a7234fa436cb.title: Which "Minimal Information" standards will you use?

e87ef779-2c4b-4c0d-a1f1-821290123a3c.text: If you require substantial amounts of compute power, amounts that are not trivially absorbed in what you usually have abailable, some planning is necessary. Do you think you need to do compute capacity planning?
e87ef779-2c4b-4c0d-a1f1-821290123a3c.title: Do you need to do compute capacity planning?

e8a08f27-9f82-4147-b446-822d34a5d468.text: There are surprisingly many complications that can cause (slight) inconsistencies between results when workflows are run on different compute infrastructures. A good way to make sure this does not bite you is to run a subset of all jobs on all different infrastructure to check the consistency.
e8a08f27-9f82-4147-b446-822d34a5d468.title: Will you run a subset of your jobs several times across the different compute infrastructures you are using?

ea7420ef-3de3-4ca8-9ff8-ac1cdb0e506f.title: What other reason do you have for not using a standard file format for this type?

eb711ea8-8ee7-40b1-a56d-1a374fe8b4c2.title: What will you use this non-reference data set for?

eb876df3-5fb5-4885-9ab6-7dbfa6ba7427.title: What way are you pseudonymizing data?

ecb23397-d44d-4623-8233-481e753492ea.text: What appointment have you made for the naming of the folders? Make sure names are relatively short, and avoid spaces and special characters.
ecb23397-d44d-4623-8233-481e753492ea.title: What are the naming conventions for the analysis folders?

ecdc6c3f-249a-4d82-822c-649754201981.title: Are you running standardized data capture or recording?

ecff019a-d4e6-44c6-a8fe-c84eb15ed8b7.title: Is this a standard data format widely used by researchers in this field?

ed3d43ad-d2b5-4194-8b05-08c95da0a7f2.title: Will the archive need to be protected against loss or theft?

ed872b74-6bf7-4cba-8f36-4da4509e4a4f.text: Often it is easiest to make sure you collect the metadata as early as possible.
ed872b74-6bf7-4cba-8f36-4da4509e4a4f.title: Do you know how and when you will be collecting the necessary metadata?

edc9b6d9-c121-4e00-ba83-710330c2e18d.title: How will you be paying for these services?

ee59664e-4026-4796-a42a-e8003df6dadf.text: Are there easily accessible specialized service providers for data capture?
ee59664e-4026-4796-a42a-e8003df6dadf.title: Who will do the measurements? And where?

ef5884e6-e61f-46e2-a940-ce64dd4c381f.title: Will you need data formats for Medical and Health Sciences?

efc80cc8-8318-4f8c-acb7-dc1c60e491c1.text: Are there any data sets available in the world that are relevant to your planned research?
efc80cc8-8318-4f8c-acb7-dc1c60e491c1.title: Is there any pre-existing data?

f00a28fb-ac77-4110-b285-c73c8bc62630.text: If there are different versions available, you have to decide with all project partners together which version you will be using. Probably you will go for the latest release as of the date of the start of your research project. However, if you have other data from older projects that need to be merged, you may need to consider using the same release you used for a previous project.
f00a28fb-ac77-4110-b285-c73c8bc62630.title: Which version will you use?

f038bd46-ee4e-4f53-b7ea-482381c2c855.text: Does the data you collect contain non-equipment captured data such as questionnaires, case report forms, electronic patient records?
f038bd46-ee4e-4f53-b7ea-482381c2c855.title: Do you have any non-equipment data capture?

f09c417a-3b3d-4dc8-a1a2-93b1c4bcf8fd.title: Which metadata standards will you use?

f0a474ac-21b5-4b6a-9fd5-b9c3f8882055.title: Has responsibility for long term safe keeping of the raw data been established? Who will deal with data publication?

f14750e9-3a39-4aae-b2c8-845583934c1d.title: Will data be copied out and in to the workspace storage by remote users?

f1609178-599a-4da6-b93b-776e4f9b626c.text: There is no concrete map of these features to suitable workflow engines at this moment, but filling in these questions can lead you to think about the most important features for the project
f1609178-599a-4da6-b93b-776e4f9b626c.title: Does it need to be easy to support new tools in a workflow?

f29e2dbd-8edc-4ac3-92ba-96a6d507789b.title: PID for the software, or URL where the software can be found

f2bcb8d2-6a73-43a4-a2d3-16f50e4577a5.title: Will you need existing data from Engineering and Technology

f3c858ab-a89f-4f08-9c17-ca45e38f9340.text: There is no concrete map of these features to suitable workflow engines at this moment, but filling in these questions can lead you to think about the most important features for the project
f3c858ab-a89f-4f08-9c17-ca45e38f9340.title: Does the workflow engine need a developer GUI?

f4065e54-d27a-45de-be4c-10384feacd0d.title: How will your first data come in?

f59d2d89-fe27-4a8a-b3e6-2782bcc2fb97.title: Do you need to request access to the data

f5b2b4d2-2031-47da-95ff-6d10792c841f.text: There is no concrete map of these features to suitable workflow engines at this moment, but filling in these questions can lead you to think about the most important features for the project
f5b2b4d2-2031-47da-95ff-6d10792c841f.title: Is ease of development of the workflows an issue for you?

f5c12fcf-15d0-44ba-a53c-49ea9d7f620f.title: Will you use temporary restrictions on the reuse of the data (embargo)?

f5e129dc-d59d-4352-a5ed-25efe1d83811.title: Will you be using this non-reference data set?

f5e162ee-1077-4ebe-a932-192bc7f67e98.title: What kind of consent will you be acquiring?

f5fef09d-ade5-4019-b089-f05bd89c34bc.text: You can use any name for the data set, make sure that it identifies the data set to yourself.
f5fef09d-ade5-4019-b089-f05bd89c34bc.title: Specify what data sets you will acquire using measurement equipment

f6476ea3-1ec5-447b-a776-4f0bfca38f8f.title: Will you be relying on these backups to recover from human error (accidental changes or deletions)?

f67a9910-4ea3-4280-b503-386dff3b8305.text: In some fields, it is considered good practice to deposit samples to a public repository before deriving any digital data from them.
f67a9910-4ea3-4280-b503-386dff3b8305.title: Do your samples need to be submitted to a public repository?

f67e1539-5c7d-4df7-8259-e4f2edfa2685.title: Will you be using common ontologies?

f691ad73-1284-4c7d-999d-34bb0612dd42.title: Did you arrange for system administration (at least security updates) and hardware maintenance for the server(s)?

f6e66f4f-7b11-420f-a4b6-5fc972bc66d9.text: If you have large volumes of data that are intensely and repeatedly used by the computing work flow, it may be needed to keep the storage in the same place as where the computing takes place.
f6e66f4f-7b11-420f-a4b6-5fc972bc66d9.title: Do you need the work space to be close to the compute capacity?

f714fa99-6c14-436c-ac62-2e7789322ecb.title: Will you need data formats for Engineering and Technology?

f78fb7e9-2f26-493c-a19b-04e153c17274.text: Consider that users of a data set will need to be able to get access several years after the project is finished. The best way to arrange this is to put the responsibility for checking the rights to access the data with a fixed body in an organisation, a data access committee, rather than one of the investigators of the project.
f78fb7e9-2f26-493c-a19b-04e153c17274.title: How will re-users be able to get access?

f83a9afd-c6de-452b-be9f-bd76e5eb6b54.text: Maintaining a repository is a long term commitment that can most of the time not be funded from project money. Think about who will be doing the system maintenance, hardware maintenance, and who will make necessary code changes to accommodate future (safe) versions of the system
f83a9afd-c6de-452b-be9f-bd76e5eb6b54.title: Will you be able to support this repository for a sufficiently long time?

f87c331d-794a-42c8-a910-61a2a9110dab.title: Will you be acquiring data using measurement equipment?

f8eeb548-f5af-4fc8-a5fd-88fdf28b0de1.title: Will you use a (sub)folder for each (repeated) analysis?

f90914d8-2731-4cd1-bbf8-2710a5e08c43.text: Sometimes, and empty field or a zero is indicating a missing value. But is that really unique? Could there be valid empty or zero fields? Has the convention for missing values been made explicit somewhere?
f90914d8-2731-4cd1-bbf8-2710a5e08c43.title: Is there a distinguishing way a missing value in the table can be recognized?

f9572d3c-c91f-4945-a56b-ccfb32750fe9.title: How will you store any applicable restrictions?

f99580d5-b3ea-498c-86ac-f7326bd999c2.title: Will the work space storage need to be remote mounted?

f99b1723-c8e4-44b9-af22-f66955eda1e2.title: Will there be different versions of this data over time?

f9d84278-b61d-4314-94e9-12644bfa1d00.text: Will you be storing (in cold storage) copies of your own data for a longer period after the project has ended? Possibly as a continuation of archival as part of data storage strategy during the project? Data archival is distinct from data publishing, an archive is usually strictly limited in who can access the data.
f9d84278-b61d-4314-94e9-12644bfa1d00.title: Will you be archiving your data in 'cold storage' after the project finishes?

fa591173-c9e5-426f-8bee-6e6082108169.title: Please specify the reason why you will not be using this reference data

fad678c7-99e4-48e2-a708-fe0dfa1381b8.title: Will you provide your results as semantically interoperable linked data?

faf72b3d-ac29-41d1-97f2-5223b199a086.text: Running a small subset of the data repeatedly can be useful to catch unexpected problems that would otherwise be very hard to detect.
faf72b3d-ac29-41d1-97f2-5223b199a086.title: Will you run part of the data set repeatedly to catch unexpected changes in results?

fcc51962-08df-4f4c-85ad-6bb932107010.text: Much of todays data is used in comparison with reference data. You may be comparing your own data with a "standard set" which is maintained as a collection by someone else. Or you could be determining differences to a standard (for example in bioinformatics, a genome is often compared with a reference genome to identify genomic variants). If you use reference data, there are several specific issues that you should consider. What are the reference data sets that you will use?
fcc51962-08df-4f4c-85ad-6bb932107010.title: What existing reference data did you consider re-using?

fdeb19c8-393c-4c4e-8c88-58a9c4d19e2b.text: There is no concrete map of these features to suitable workflow engines at this moment, but filling in these questions can lead you to think about the most important features for the project
fdeb19c8-393c-4c4e-8c88-58a9c4d19e2b.title: Is ease of development of the workflow engine itself an issue for you?

feb954c1-c38e-4615-addd-4c714a06809a.title: Has authority over the data been arranged for when the project is finished (potentially long after)?

ff6f53f1-1adc-4401-bbda-a159d283a8eb.text: There is no concrete map of these features to suitable workflow engines at this moment, but filling in these questions can lead you to think about the most important features for the project
ff6f53f1-1adc-4401-bbda-a159d283a8eb.title: Do you need the workflow engine to be run high-throughput?

ff85db18-565c-4177-a397-9a8cf4c7b374.text: Linked data is very suitable to integrate data, especially if the data sources are already represented as linked data.
ff85db18-565c-4177-a397-9a8cf4c7b374.title: What will be your approach?
